Budapest-v0.1 Dataset README
	


	
		
	
	
		Overview
	

The Budapest-v0.1 dataset is a cutting-edge resource specifically designed for fine-tuning large language models (LLMs). Created using GPT-4, this dataset is presented in a message-response format, making it particularly suitable for a variety of natural language processing tasks. The primary focus of Budapest-v0.1 is to aid in the development and enhancement of algorithms capable of performing summarization, questionâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/Bazsalanszky/budapest-v0.1-hun.
